column5: ARA_DESCRIPTION

Incl. Amorgos, Anafi, Anidros, Andros, Andiparos, Denousa, Folegandros, Ios, Iraklia, Karos, Kimolos, Kea, Kythnos, Milos, Mykonos, Naxos, Paros, Poliaigos, Serifos, Sifnos, Sikinos, Syros, Thira, Tinos, Yiaros and other smaller islands

Incl. Alimnia, Arkoi, Astipalaia, Avgonisi, Ankathonisi, Farmakonisi, Ioinianisia, Kalimnos, Kalolimnos, Kandeliousa, Karpathos, Kasos, Khalki, Khamili, Kinaros, Kos, Leros, Levitha, Lipsoi, Meyisti, Nisiros, Ofidousa, Patmos, Rodhos, Saria, Simi, Sirina,
